errors.error_description: Added unnecessary dependencies 'setuptools wheel' to the pip install command
Incorrectly states the package requires Python 2.7 compatibility when Python 2.7 is no longer supported
correction_candidates: This package requires Python 3.6 or higher.
This package supports Python 3.x versions only.
This package requires Python 3.8+ for optimal performance.
This package is compatible with Python 3.7 and above.
errors.golden_answer: This package requires Python 3.6 or higher.
